item.title: maintainerati 2017
item.description: I was at maintainerati today, which was super fun & quite intense! I highly appreciate GitHub & the individuals involved in making it happen! Here’s my key takeaways from this (and several other conversations over the last few weeks leading up to this): I am now a maintainer, which is quite a different thing from a core contributor or just a contributor. The power dynamics are very different, and so are the responsibilities.
